body:
The first one is up:
http://luminance.londonmet.ac.uk/radiance_workshops/index.html


Does everybody feel that the ISO images are really necessary? It's easier
to turn a ZIP into an ISO than the other way 'round. At the moment, there
is
a) HTML tree of presentations,
b) ISO images
c) ZIP archives of a)


While a) is important to have on-line, I think it should be b) OR c), not
b) AND c). Total of 3.3 GB.


Any thoughts?


Cheers


Axel
___
